    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MarketAdjustableActor(RoboticonQuest game, com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Skin skin, ResourceType resourceType, boolean buy)
      Constructs an interface to handle the purchase or sale of a particular resource-type Populated with buttons for incrementing/decrementing a desired quantity of a particular resource to buy/sell, along with an additional button for initiating the relevant transaction and any necessary labels to indicate the widget's function and current state

    • Constructor Detail

      • MarketAdjustableActor

        public MarketAdjustableActor(RoboticonQuest game,
                             com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Skin skin,
                             ResourceType resourceType,
                             boolean buy)
        Constructs an interface to handle the purchase or sale of a particular resource-type Populated with buttons for incrementing/decrementing a desired quantity of a particular resource to buy/sell, along with an additional button for initiating the relevant transaction and any necessary labels to indicate the widget's function and current state
        Parameters:
        game - The game's engine
        skin - The skin-file determining the widget's visual parameters
        resourceType - The type of resource that the widget will handle purchases/sales for
        buy - Determines whether the widget will handle purchasing resources for the player or selling the resources that the player owns to the market
